miic.core.inversion.hard_threshold_dv¶

hard_threshold_dv(dv, corr, threshold)[source]¶

Put dv[corr < threshould] to nan

This function removes all the velocity_change values that are related with correlation values less then threshold to limit the study to those points in time that are reliable in terms of accuracy of the proposed model.

Parameters:
  • dv (DataFrame) – DataFrame that stores the velocity change
  • corr (DataFrame) – DataFrame that stores the correlation values
  • threshold (float) – threshold for the correlation value to accept the velocity change has meaningful.
Returns:

dv
